title: Milo Nqoro
text:
Milo Nqoro (born 16 December 1988) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
He started his career playing for the in various youth competitions, before moving to the . In 2010, he moved back to the where he made his professional debut.
He also played for the <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">South Africa sevens team</a> in 2008.
